scripts.prepare: set-defaults .vscode && forge install --no-git foundry-rs/forge-std@v1.6.0 openzeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts@v4.9.3 transmissions11/solmate@v6 || echo ''
scripts.start: zellij --layout zellij.kdl a template-foundry || zellij --layout zellij.kdl -s template-foundry
scripts.watch_compile: as-soon -w script -w src -w test pnpm compile
scripts.watch_deploy: as-soon -w script -w src -w test pnpm run deploy
scripts.watch_test: as-soon -w script -w src -w test pnpm test
scripts.watch_out_deploy: pnpm compile; as-soon -w out pnpm run deploy
scripts.watch_out_test: pnpm compile; as-soon -w out pnpm run deploy
scripts.deploy_0_A: ldenv -m localhost forge script script/000_DeployMockERC20A.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.deploy_0_B: ldenv -m localhost forge script script/000_DeployMockERC20B.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.deploy_1: ldenv -m localhost forge script script/001_DeployAddressTable.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.deploy_2: ldenv -m localhost forge script script/002_DeployUniswapV2Router02_Optimized.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.deploy_3: ldenv -m localhost forge script script/003_DeployUniswapV2Router02_Encoder.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.deploy_4: ldenv -m localhost forge script script/004_DeployUniswapV2Router02_Original.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.deploy_local_all: ldenv -m localhost pnpm deploy_0_A ~~ pnpm deploy_0_B ~~ pnpm deploy_1 ~~ pnpm register_address ~~ pnpm register_owner ~~ pnpm deploy_2 ~~ pnpm deploy_3 ~~ pnpm deploy_4 ~~
scripts.goerli_deploy_0_A: ldenv -m goerli forge script script/000_DeployMockERC20A.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.goerli_verify_0_A: ldenv -m goerli forge verify-contract --chain-id 5 --num-of-optimizations 200 --watch --constructor-args $(cast abi-encode "constructor(string,string,uint8)" "MockTokenA" "TA" 18) --etherscan-api-key @@ETHERSCAN_KEY --compiler-version v0.8.19 0xf23249471cC0E0f3874F482215f62B00C8e5E2bF src/mock/MockERC20.sol:MockERC20
scripts.goerli_deploy_0_B: ldenv -m goerli forge script script/000_DeployMockERC20B.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.goerli_verify_0_B: ldenv -m goerli forge verify-contract --chain-id 5 --num-of-optimizations 200 --watch --constructor-args $(cast abi-encode "constructor(string,string,uint8)" "MockTokenB" "TB" 18) --etherscan-api-key @@ETHERSCAN_KEY --compiler-version v0.8.19 0x01D1BFBA56654d7736fE4d0D51Aacc147B3a6589 src/mock/MockERC20.sol:MockERC20
scripts.goerli_deploy_1: ldenv -m goerli forge script script/001_DeployAddressTable.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.goerli_verify_1: ldenv -m goerli forge verify-contract --chain-id 5 --num-of-optimizations 200 --watch --etherscan-api-key @@ETHERSCAN_KEY --compiler-version v0.8.19 0x9a6B7caf7dEf6aC3a09be05F72A15ecD32F5A47c src/AddressTable.sol:AddressTable
scripts.goerli_deploy_2: ldenv -m goerli forge script script/002_DeployUniswapV2Router02_Optimized.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.goerli_verify_2: ldenv -m goerli forge verify-contract --chain-id 5 --num-of-optimizations 200 --watch --constructor-args $(cast abi-encode "constructor(address,address,IAddressTable)" 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 0x9a6B7caf7dEf6aC3a09be05F72A15ecD32F5A47c) --etherscan-api-key @@ETHERSCAN_KEY --compiler-version v0.8.19 0x8c8af7C9b8B38165A3177925C06B063611e3a86F src/UniswapV2Router02_Optimized.sol:UniswapV2Router02_Optimized
scripts.goerli_deploy_3: ldenv -m goerli forge script script/003_DeployUniswapV2Router02_Encoder.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.goerli_deploy_4: ldenv -m goerli forge script script/004_DeployUniswapV2Router02_Original.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.goerli_deploy_local_all: ldenv -m goerli pnpm deploy_0_A ~~ pnpm deploy_0_B ~~ pnpm deploy_1 ~~ pnpm register_address ~~ pnpm register_owner ~~ pnpm deploy_2 ~~ pnpm deploy_3 ~~ pnpm deploy_4 ~~
scripts.deploy_0_Atrezor: ldenv -m optimism forge script script/000_DeployMockERC20A.s.sol --trezor --sender @@DEPLOYER --mnemonic-derivation-paths "m/44'/60'/0'/0/0" --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.verify_0_A: ldenv -m optimism forge verify-contract --chain-id 10 --num-of-optimizations 200 --watch --constructor-args $(cast abi-encode "constructor(string,string,uint8)" "MockTokenA" "TA" 18) --etherscan-api-key @@ETHERSCAN_KEY --compiler-version v0.8.19 @@MockERC20_ADDRESS src/mock/MockERC20.sol:MockERC20
scripts.deploy_0_B_trezor: ldenv -m optimism forge script script/000_DeployMockERC20B.s.sol --trezor --sender @@DEPLOYER --mnemonic-derivation-paths "m/44'/60'/0'/0/0" --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_UL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@

scripts.deploy_all_trezor: ldenv -m optimism pnpm deploy_0_A ~~ pnpm deploy_0_B ~~ pnpm deploy_1 ~~ pnpm register_address ~~ pnpm register_owner ~~ pnpm deploy_2 ~~ pnpm deploy_3 ~~ pnpm deploy_4 ~~
